msbt.message: What up, fishionista! C.J. here, comin' at you live from, uh r-right in front of you! Nyuk!I'm tourin' the islands looking for fresh faces and fresher fish to show off on my livestream.Fishing is reelin' in ALL KINDS of streaming numbers right now. Heard of esports? Well, this is SEAsports!Anywave, I need new fish if I wanna keep my followers followin'. That's where you come in.If you got fish to sell, then I wanna buy. Simple as that. I'll even pay premium. Nyuk!So you cash out, I get new selfies for my blog, and my viewers get to hear me talk fish. Everyone wins!

C.J. here, comin' at you, um Well, it's more like standin' by you, I guess. Nyuk, nyuk!Anywave, ever since I started doing my seasports challenges, I've been trending in a HUGE way.It's so slick! Each time someone navigates a challenge, I offer to buy up their fish. I even pay premium!I only offer to buy after a challenge, though. Keeps it interesting! Nyuk!But everyone's aboard. I get way fresh fish for my livestream, and the lucky angler gets showered in Bells.

So! How 'bout a challenge, seasports style? Right now! Win and I'll make it RING, and talk you up on my stream.Plus my partner's into makin' slick collectibles if you want one. He's sooooo talented. Nyuk nyuk!
Seasports challenges?
Collectibles?
Not now.

So! How 'bout a challenge, seasports style? Right now! Win and I'll make it RING, and talk you up on my stream.Plus my partner's into makin' slick collectibles if you want one. He's sooooo talented. Nyuk nyuk!
Got a seasports challenge?
Collectibles?
Not now.

So! How 'bout a challenge, seasports style? Right now! Win and I'll make it RING, and talk you up on my stream.Plus my partner's into makin' slick collectibles if you want one. He's sooooo talented. Nyuk nyuk!
Seasports challenges?
Make me a collectible.
Not now.

So! How 'bout a challenge, seasports style? Right now! Win and I'll make it RING, and talk you up on my stream.Plus my partner's into makin' slick collectibles if you want one. He's sooooo talented. Nyuk nyuk!
Got a seasports challenge?
Make me a collectible.
Not now.
Huh? Oh, OK. I'll be floatin' here until or so tomorrow, so hit me up if you change your mind.
Huh? Oh, OK. I'll be floatin' here until or so, so hit me up if you change your mind. Nyuk!
You got it, chum! Time to dive in and school this challenge! Nyuk!
Alright, today I want you to catch big-time fish in a row, all about the size of .And critters like soft-shelled turtles or snapping turtles also count! They're pretty big too. Nyuk!
Today I wanna see those small fry catchin' skills! Reel in in a row, all -ish or so in size.As long as it's small, it'll count, so if you spot a crawfish or frog out there, bring it aboard! Nyuk!
Today is freestyle day, so show us what you got. Just catch whatever's out there. But do it times in a row!

And don't go catchin' other-sized fish or my subscribers will get mad and there goes your streak.Oh, and don't let 'em slip off your hook either. That'll cut your streak too. Sorry, chat request.I know, I know, SO MANY RULES! But I gotta keep folks happy or my views drop. Now go catch somethin'! Nyuk!

I wanna see those fishing skills, and I just KNOW my viewers do too.Here's how it'll go. I'll tell you what fish to catch, and you get fishin'.But the hook is that it switches up each time. Gotta keep 'em guessin', plus I can't afford another cheating scandal.Alright, that's the dealio. Are you ready for some seasport action? 'Cause it's challenge time!
Today my viewers want you to reel in big-time fish in a row. So, like, -ish in size or so.
Today I wanna showcase a small fry, so-ish in size. Think you can catch in a row?
Gonna take it easy today. Just catch fish in a row. Any kind is good. Nyuk nyuk!
If you wow my viewers, I'll wow YOU with some serious Bells! I'll buy those fish off you like THAT.
Let's do this!
Wait, say that again...
Not now.
What up, fishionista! Picked a name for your anglersona yet? Nyuk!
I'm gonna put your name on a seasports challenge highlight reel and get you PAID! Nyuk nyuk!Anytime you wanna step up, just, uhy-yeah, just step up.
Seasports challenges?
Aren't there collectibles?
Nah, I'm good.
SOME folks see this weather and say, "Can't fish, it's raining." I look at it and say, "Fish don't know I'm wet."
SOME folks see this weather and say, "Can't fish, it's snowing."I look at it and say, "Fish can't throw snowballs."
I'm gonna put your name on a seasports challenge highlight reel and get you PAID! Nyuk nyuk!Anytime you wanna step up, just, uhy-yeah, just step up.
Got a seasports challenge?
Aren't there collectibles?
Nah, I'm good.
You're like some kind of seasport savant. I'm gonna get followers, and likes, and even subscribes!Thanks. Seriously. Hit me up if there's anything I can help you with. Nyuk!
How's my progress?
Seasports challenges?
Make me a collectible.
Nah, I'm good.
No worries. Later!
You're like some kind of seasport savant. I'm gonna get followers, and likes, and even subscribes!Thanks. Seriously. Hit me up if there's anything I can help you with. Nyuk!
How's my progress?
Seasports challenges?
Aren't there collectibles?
Nah, I'm good.

Ithought I went over that. Maybe my stream dropped out? Alright, no big deal! Here goesagain.My seasports challenges help me show who's got the passion and the pizzazz to be an angler legend.They're also what keeps my viewers hooked, which means sponsors, which means I can buy your fish.So yeah, sink a challenge and it helps me help YOU get paid. Win-win!
Today my viewers want you to reel in big-time fish in a row. That's, like, -ish in size or so.And critters like soft-shelled turtles or snapping turtles also count! They're pretty big too. Nyuk!
Today I'm doin' a small fry showcase, so-ish in size. Can you catch me in a row?As long as it's small, it'll count, so if you spot a crawfish or frog out there, bring it aboard! Nyuk!
Today we're takin' it easy breezy. Just catch whatever's in the water, but do it times in a row. Nyuk!
Now let's see how you're doin'
Look at you, flyfisher! You've caught big-time fish in a row!
Nice! Everyone's gonna love how you reeled in that last small fry. Oh, and you're up to in a row.
Look at you, flyfisher! You've caught fish in a row!You are CRUISIN' through my seasports challenge. Remember, your target is to net in a row.
Yeah, you're CRUISIN' through my seasports challenge. Remember, your target is to net in a row.
Oh, nice! Looks like you've caught big-time fish already.
Oh, nice! Looks like you've caught small fry already.
Oh, nice! Looks like you've caught fish already.
I can't wait to see you sink this seasports challenge. Remember, your target is to net in a row.
Oh! Uh, it looks like you haven't caught any big-time fish yet? Might wanna get on that.
Oh! Uh, doesn't look like you've caught a single small fry yet. You should get on that.
Oh! Uh, it looks like you haven't caught any fish yet? Feel free to dive in whenever.

Also, don't catch any other-sized fish, OR let one slip off your hook. That'll wipe out your streak. Nyuk!OK, that's enough from me. You got this. I know it, my viewers know it, and now YOU know it. Keep it reel!
Sure. Let's see how you're doin'
Oh, and if any fish slip off your hook, that'll break your streak. For reel. Now go catch fish in a row! Nyuk!
What?! You caught big-time fish in a row already?
Huh?! You caught fish in a row? AND every one was a small fry?!
No way! You ALREADY caught fish in a row?
Now THAT'S gonna make the chat explode. So much for my seasports challenge. Way to fish!
Hey! Wanna sell any of those fish? 'Cause I wanna buy! I've got Bells for nautical miles, so chime on in.
Yes, please!
Not now.
Oh, OK. Maybe later!
Yeah, flyfisher! Show me what you wanna sell!
Oh, OK. I'll be treadin' water here till or so tomorrow, so hit me up if you change your mind. Nyuk!
Oh, OK. I'll be treadin' water here till or so, so hit me up if you change your mind. Nyuk!
If you got fish to sell, then I wanna buy. I got a whole tackle box full of Bells, so just let me know!
Photo op!
Way to wreck that seasports challenge! What a haul!
Hey, if you got fish to sell, I'm your hookup! I got Bells jinglin' a hole in my pocket.
Buy my fish!
Aren't there collectibles?
Nah, I'm good.

UhI don't wanna be rude but What fish? Wait, are you trawling me? 'Cause that's pretty good.Anywave, I can't buy what you don't have. No big, though. Just drift back after you get a nibble or two. Nyuk!
Great! What do you wanna sell?
Hey, if you got fish to sell, I'm your hookup! I got Bells jinglin' a hole in my pocket.
Buy my fish!
Make me a collectible.
Nah, I'm good.
! Reel nice!I'll pay for your . Sound good?
Sold!
Eh, changed my mind.
Oh, you got a whole school for me? All together that'll be . Deal?
Sold!
Eh, changed my mind.
SPLASH! Make my viewers happy, and I'll make YOU happy. Let's make it RING! Nyuk!
Oh! Changed your mind? That's cool.

Fintastic! Keepin' my followers hooked is SO MUCH WORK. So, thanks for the help.Oh yeah! I'm anchorin' a special event soonâ€”the Fishing Tourney. You oughta come. Nyuk nyuk!Gonna be super fun even if you're still wet behind the ears. Plus you might snag some swag. Just sayin'.

Ha! Knew that'd hook you.Yeah, you put in an order for a collectible, I'll get you a SUPER reelistic model of your favorite fish. My partner's a total artist, and I can guarantee these models'll make your neighbors jealous! Usually he's all about models of bugs and stuff, but when he's got a fish to work from, his work is AMAZING!
Just bring me of the same kind of fish and I'll get it goin' for you, all for the low, low price of NOTHIN'!
Let's talk orders.
Wait, say that again...
Not now.
Yup! Yours is comin'. , right?Yeah, I saw it being worked on. It's still kinda rough, but it's gonna be SO SLICK. Just hold tight! Nyuk!
Tempting bait, eh? Look, I really wanna, but it doesn't look like you have enough fish. Nyuk!If you're gonna order something, my partner needs of the same fish. And he ain't gonna bob on that.
Let's! Alright, check your tackle box, pick out your fish, and I'll have my partner start castin' your collectible.
Nice ! And you're cool with givin' me of 'em?
Yes, please!
Eh, changed my mind.
Just an FYI, genius takes time. My partner's on it, though, so as soon as it's done I'll drop you a line.
All good, all good. Just drop me a line if you change your mind. Nyuk!

Oh, totally! Collectibles are hot. I can get you a SUPER reelistic, collectible model of any fish you want, easy.I just cast a line out to my partner, he works his artist magic, and a bit later, SPLASH! Collectible. Cool, eh?
Fintastic! You got it! I'll get your collectible goin'!
Oh! You wanna get a collectible goin'? Well, alright!

Your order's aweigh! It's gonna be so slick. You'll see. Nyuk!All this fish stuff Y'know, if my old man had never showed me the ropes, I don't think I'd be so immersed in it.Still, I had to dredge up a lot on my own. My old man loves fish, but he knows nothin' about catching 'em

Doesn't stop him from grabbing his fishing pole and floatin' out in his boat every chance he gets, though.I think he just likes bein' on the water. Or gazing at all the fancy lures in his tackle box. Probably both.Anywave, I'm driftin'. I'll get that collectible to you the minute it's shipshape, alright? Nyuk nyuk!

Your order's off! It's all smooth sailin' from here. Nyuk!Hey, you ever ordered any of the bug stuff Flick makes? Did you know he's castin' these fish collectibles too?Flick and I go back a long way. Our families used to hang out all the time, so we kinda grew up together.

I remember his dad was OBSESSED with bugs. That's pretty much where Flick gets it fromI mean, Flick and his dad used to plan vacations out to SWAMPS just so they could chase bugs there!Knowing Flick's dad, he's probably out with his net right this secondAnywave, back to fish! I'll get that collectible shipped out to you as soon as it's seaworthy. Nyuk!
Your order's set to sail. I'll get Flick on deck as soon as I get home. Nyuk!Huh? Oh, Flick's my roommate. When we both shipped out on our own, it just kinda made sense.
Now I've got my streamin' setup, and he's got a harbor to make his slick art. It's pretty swell!And speaking of, you'll get that collectible as soon as it's ready to leave port, alright? Nyuk nyuk!

What is up, fishionista! C.J. here, comin' at you live from, uhhere.I'm tourin' the islands looking for fresh faces and fresher fish to show off on my livestream.See, fishing is reelin' in MAJOR streaming numbers right now. Heard of esports? This is SEAsports!Anywave, I need new fish if I wanna keep my followers followin', so I'm askin' local anglers to help out.It's a pretty simple setup. I just buy their fish at a premium. Nyuk!So they cash out, I get new selfies for my blog, and my viewers get to hear me talk fish. Everyone wins!

It's kinda cool how every island's got its own types of fish. And also kinda crazy.It can be SO MUCH WORK to show off a certain fish on my stream that sometimes I just wanna cut bait.But keepin' my viewers happy is everything to me. Each one of them's a keeper. Nyuk!

Yo! 'Sup? You fishin' out here? Nyuk!Pro tip! Make friends with a local and ask 'em about the best fishin' spots. You never know what's out there!I'm gonna be castin' my show here for a while longer. We'll catch up next time I'm on !

I have this feelin'like someone's gonna reel in the big one, and then I'll get to talk about it on my show!I get nervous when someone wants to sell me their fish. Whatever I buy, THAT'S what my show's on that day.It keeps me and my viewers on our toes. The world of streaming is sink or swim, but that gives me the edge!
Yes, please!
Eh, changed my mind.
Not now.
big-time fish
small fry
Nah, I'm good.
Aren't there collectibles?
Sold!
How's my progress?
Let's do this!
Wait, say that again...
Buy my fish!
Let's talk orders.
Collectibles?
Seasports challenges?
Got a seasports challenge?
Make me a collectible.
